#  Mike Riley 

Mike was elected to the Bend City Council in 2022.

***

 __Council Position:__ 

6th

 __Term Ends:__ 

2026

## Contact

 *  [Mike Riley](https://www.bendoregon.gov/Home/Components/StaffDirectory/StaffDirectory/503/36?backlist=/government/city-council/mike-riley)   

City Councilor  

   * 541-749-0638
   *  [mriley@bendoregon.gov]() 
 [](https://www.bendoregon.gov/services/advanced-components/staff-directory)  

 ![Mike is of fair complexion and has short gray hair.](images/063e3d61fa52f2698b42e060942282d958d90b9fb324196f55d74255f76512dd.jpg) Mike was born in Canada, immigrated to the U.S. when he was six, and grew up in California. He has worked primarily in the nonprofit sector, in organizations focused on primary care and emergency medicine, outdoor education, and environmental advocacy. He worked for several years as an EMT-Paramedic in the Bay area and for several years leading wilderness expeditions in Kenya, Africa. Mike and his wife moved to Bend in 1997 and raised their two boys here. He enjoys a wide range of outdoor activities, including skiing, mountain bike riding, river rafting, and exploring the western U.S.

Mike ran for City Council to help make Bend a safe, affordable, and livable community for everyone who calls our small city home. 

## Education

 *  __University of Washington__ , BS, Environmental Science
 *  __John Adams Community College__ , EMT-Paramedic

## Professional and Volunteer Experience

 *  __The Environmental Center, __ Executive Director
 *  __The Bend Recycling Team, __ Executive Director
 *  __National Outdoor Leadership School, __ Senior Instructor
 *  __Bend's Citywide Transportation Advisory Committee__ , Co-Chair
 *  __Bend's Urban Growth Boundary Advisory Committee__ , Co-Chair

 *  [## Public Contracts Subcommittee](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/city-council/council-subcommittees/public-contracts-subcommittee) 
 *  [## Central Oregon Intergovernmental Council (COIC) - Primary](https://www.coic.org/) 
 *  [## Local Public Safety Coordinating Council](https://www.deschutes.org/justice/page/local-public-safety-coordinating-council) 
 *  [## Metropolitan Planning Organization (MPO)](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/departments/bend-metro-planning-organization) 
 *  [## Deschutes Basin Water Collective - Alternate](https://www.coic.org/dbwc/) 
 *  [## Old Farm Neighborhood District](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/departments/communications-engagement/neighborhood-districts) 
 *  [## Old Bend Neighborhood District](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/departments/communications-engagement/neighborhood-districts)
